item.title: Setup Home Net Disk Using Raspberry Pi
item.description: Background Recently I bought a projector at home. I would like to play some video files from the PC. Even though the projector has a HDMI port, it is still troublesome to manually plug the HDMI cable. Since the projector is actually an Android device, I realized that this is actually a general problem: how to setup a file sharing system that all the devices with different OS (Linux, Windows, Android, iOS) at home can access.
